com.dsi.ant.chip

Interface IAntChipDetector

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AntChipDetectorBase

    public interface IAntChipDetector
    Specifies the interface the ANT Radio Service uses to communicate with a remote service providing a transport to ANT hardware.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void destroy()
      Clean up this instance, it will not be used again (eg.
      IAntChip[] scanForNewChips()
      Tell the detector to manually check for any newly added chips it may not know about, or try reconnecting to any which failed previously.
      void start(IAntChipDetectorEventReceiver eventReceiver)
      Starts detection of chips being added and removed.
      void stop()
      Shutdown the back end.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        void start(IAntChipDetectorEventReceiver eventReceiver)
        Starts detection of chips being added and removed.
        Parameters:
        eventReceiver - The reference to be used for notifications about new hardware and removed hardware. This may be null.

      • stop

        void stop()
        Shutdown the back end. Called when the ANT Radio Service will no longer be using the ANT hardware for a while.

      • scanForNewChips

        IAntChip[] scanForNewChips()
        Tell the detector to manually check for any newly added chips it may not know about, or try reconnecting to any which failed previously. This allows for systems that don't have a working hotplug detect and therefore need to poll for new devices occasionally.
        Returns:
        list with the new chips, or
        zero length list if there are no new chips.

      • destroy

        void destroy()
        Clean up this instance, it will not be used again (eg. the remote service has unbound).
